creator: ajayrathod099@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 31347
Master Machine jmeter Log file

Steps 
1 : created Master on My Local PC 

2: Slave Created on VM_ware with same jmeter setup which i have installed on local pc saved at same place like on local PC "C:\Documents and Settings\Ajay\Desktop\apache-jmeter-2.11\bin 

3: on Both Machine Firewall is disabled.

4:In Salve machine in edited in "jmeter-server.bat" at above mentioned location and added the path of rmiregistry path where actual java installed same like as below 
REM START"C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\rmiregistry.exe"

5.On Master Machine in jmeter.property file changed the host ip to (slave Machine IP)10.10.10.XXX 

6 Run the jmeter.server.bat in CMD on Slave

7 On Master ,Opened the test through  Jmeter GUI which need to run on remote slave Machine Gone to Run Tab >clicked on "Remorte Start" 10.10.10.XXX

Display Error on GUI
"Error in rconfigure() method java.rmi.MarshalException: error marshalling arguments; nested exception is: 
java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: socket write error"

Attached Master & Slave Machine jmeter log File for Reference

Created attachment 31348
slave Machine server.jmeter Log file
creator: ajayrathod099@gmail.com
